segments.content: Hi everyone!
segments.sourceMdx: Hi everyone!

segments.content: Cyril and Matthieu from Theodo Apps (formerly BAM) here 👋, standing in for Seb to bring you the latest news from React and React Native!
segments.sourceMdx: Cyril and Matthieu from Theodo Apps (formerly BAM) here 👋, standing in for Seb to bring you the latest news from React and React Native!
segments.translated_content: 我们是来自Theodo Apps（原BAM）的Cyril和Matthieu 👋，本周暂代Seb为大家带来React和React Native的最新动态！

segments.content: Big news from the React world this week! React 19 is back in RC, six months after its initial release was postponed. The suspense over Suspense is finally easing with the introduction of pre-warming.
segments.sourceMdx: Big news from the React world this week! React 19 is back in RC, six months after its initial release was postponed. The suspense over Suspense is finally easing with the introduction of pre-warming.
segments.translated_content: 本周React世界传来重磅消息！React 19在延期六个月后重新进入RC阶段。随着预加载（pre-warming）机制的引入，Suspense相关的悬念终于尘埃落定。

segments.content: Expo is making waves during its launch party, and the excitement keeps building! 🚀
segments.sourceMdx: Expo is making waves during its launch party, and the excitement keeps building! 🚀
segments.translated_content: Expo正在其发布派对中掀起波澜，热度持续攀升！🚀

segments.content: The newly announced **Expo Workflows** promises to revolutionize CI/CD for React Native apps with pre-packaged jobs, intelligent machine selection, and seamless automation — streamlining the entire release process.
segments.sourceMdx: The newly announced **Expo Workflows** promises to revolutionize CI/CD for React Native apps with pre-packaged jobs, intelligent machine selection, and seamless automation — streamlining the entire release process.
segments.translated_content: 全新发布的**Expo Workflows**将通过预制任务、智能机器选择和无缝自动化彻底改变React Native应用的CI/CD流程——让整个发布过程更加高效。

segments.content: Meanwhile, **Universal React Server Components** in Expo Router have entered beta, marking a major milestone in the journey toward **server-first React Native development**.
segments.sourceMdx: Meanwhile, **Universal React Server Components** in Expo Router have entered beta, marking a major milestone in the journey toward **server-first React Native development**.
segments.translated_content: 与此同时，Expo Router中的**通用React服务端组件**已进入测试阶段，这标志着**服务端优先的React Native开发模式**迈出了重要一步。

segments.content: And the party isn’t over yet! 🎉 Stay tuned for next week’s issue, where we’ll dive into even more announcements from Expo’s ongoing celebration.
segments.sourceMdx: And the party isn’t over yet! 🎉 Stay tuned for next week’s issue, where we’ll dive into even more announcements from Expo’s ongoing celebration.
segments.translated_content: 精彩远未结束！🎉 敬请期待下周的专题报道，我们将深入解析Expo持续庆祝活动中发布的更多公告。

segments.content: Also check our partner conf [React Paris 2025](https://react.paris/?utm_source=Newsletter\&utm_medium=thisweekinreact) (🇫🇷 Paris - 20 & 21 March). Kick off your year with one of the first dev conferences of 2025! Speakers include Dominik 'TkDodo' Dorfmeister, Kent C. Dodds, and Aurora Scharff. CFPs are open, and you can get 20% off tickets with code "TWIR"!
segments.sourceMdx: Also check our partner conf [React Paris 2025](https://react.paris/?utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=thisweekinreact) (🇫🇷 Paris - 20 & 21 March). Kick off your year with one of the first dev conferences of 2025! Speakers include Dominik 'TkDodo' Dorfmeister, Kent C. Dodds, and Aurora Scharff. CFPs are open, and you can get 20% off tickets with code "TWIR"!
segments.translated_content: 另请关注我们的合作伙伴会议[React Paris 2025](https://react.paris/?utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=thisweekinreact)（🇫🇷 巴黎 - 2025年3月20-21日）。与Dominik 'TkDodo' Dorfmeister、Kent C. Dodds和Aurora Scharff等演讲嘉宾共同开启2025年首批开发者盛会！CFP正在征集中，使用优惠码"TWIR"可享门票8折！

segments.content: ## 💸 Sponsor
segments.sourceMdx: ## 💸 Sponsor {#sponsor1}

segments.content: [![Handsontable: Advanced data grid for your React app](/emails/issues/206/handsontable.jpg)](https://handsontable.com/docs/react-data-grid/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=newsletter\&utm_campaign=twirnov20)

segments.content: **[Handsontable: Advanced data grid for your React app](https://handsontable.com/docs/react-data-grid/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=newsletter\&utm_campaign=twirnov20)**
segments.sourceMdx: **[Handsontable: Advanced data grid for your React app](https://handsontable.com/docs/react-data-grid/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirnov20)**

segments.content: Handsontable is [a feature-rich data grid](https://handsontable.com/demo?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=newsletter\&utm_campaign=twirnov20) designed for React developers who need a powerful, customizable, and accessible solution to manage complex data.
segments.sourceMdx: Handsontable is [a feature-rich data grid](https://handsontable.com/demo?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirnov20) designed for React developers who need a powerful, customizable, and accessible solution to manage complex data.
segments.translated_content: Handsontable是[功能丰富的数据网格](https://handsontable.com/demo?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=twirnov20)，专为需要强大、可定制且易访问方案来管理复杂数据的React开发者设计。

segments.content:
* A unique **spreadsheet-like interface** with sorting, filtering, and CRUD operations
* Advanced operations like conditional formatting and **400 built-in formulas**, similar to Excel
* **Customizable editors and renderers**, allowing dropdowns, menus or custom components within grid cells to fit specific use cases
* **Optimized performance** for smooth and responsive interactions
* **Accessibility with WCAG 2.1 compliance** for better support for users with disabilities
segments.sourceMdx:
- A unique **spreadsheet-like interface** with sorting, filtering, and CRUD operations
- Advanced operations like conditional formatting and **400 built-in formulas**, similar to Excel
- **Customizable editors and renderers**, allowing dropdowns, menus or custom components within grid cells to fit specific use cases
- **Optimized performance** for smooth and responsive interactions
- **Accessibility with WCAG 2.1 compliance** for better support for users with disabilities
segments.translated_content:
- 独特的**类电子表格界面**，支持排序、筛选和CRUD操作
- 高级功能如条件格式和**400多种内置公式**，媲美Excel
- **可定制的编辑器和渲染器**，允许在网格单元格中使用下拉菜单或自定义组件以适应特定场景
- **性能优化**确保流畅响应
- **符合WCAG 2.1标准的无障碍支持**，更好地服务残障用户

segments.content: Handsontable adapts to various use cases, from enterprise applications to simple websites, offering performance and flexibility trusted by companies worldwide.
segments.sourceMdx: Handsontable adapts to various use cases, from enterprise applications to simple websites, offering performance and flexibility trusted by companies worldwide.
segments.translated_content: Handsontable适用于从企业级应用到简单网站的各种场景，其性能和灵活性已获全球企业信赖。

segments.content: ## ⚛️ React
segments.sourceMdx: ## ⚛️ React {#react}

segments.content: [![React 19 RC1](/emails/issues/210/react19.jpg)](https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/29898#issuecomment-2477449973)
segments.sourceMdx: [![React 19 RC1](/emails/issues/210/react19.jpg)](https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/29898#issuecomment-2477449973)

segments.content: [**React 19 RC1 - Siblings pre-warming**](https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/29898#issuecomment-2477449973)
segments.sourceMdx: [**React 19 RC1 - Siblings pre-warming**](https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/29898#issuecomment-2477449973)

segments.content:
We’ve covered how the initial release of React 19 was aborted because of a change in Suspense that would have caused waterfalls in apps that use Suspense without starting fetches in event handlers.\
The React team has been hard at work to reintroduce Suspense sibling prerendering without causing performance regressions for apps that start fetching early. Their solution is now ready and it’s called [pre-warming](https://react.dev/blog/2024/04/25/react-19-upgrade-guide#improvements-to-suspense). Dominik, the React Query maintainer who raised awareness of this problem, [has confirmed he’s happy with the fix](https://bsky.app/profile/tkdodo.eu/post/3layw6wk5bs2b).\
As usual, the new features were already available in Next.JS (which uses react canary). They include server components and actions, the new `use` hook, improvements to forms handling (`useFormStatus` and `useOptimistic`), and a small but long-awaited change: `forwardRef` is not necessary anymore!
segments.sourceMdx:
We’ve covered how the initial release of React 19 was aborted because of a change in Suspense that would have caused waterfalls in apps that use Suspense without starting fetches in event handlers.  
The React team has been hard at work to reintroduce Suspense sibling prerendering without causing performance regressions for apps that start fetching early. Their solution is now ready and it’s called [pre-warming](https://react.dev/blog/2024/04/25/react-19-upgrade-guide#improvements-to-suspense). Dominik, the React Query maintainer who raised awareness of this problem, [has confirmed he’s happy with the fix](https://bsky.app/profile/tkdodo.eu/post/3layw6wk5bs2b).  
As usual, the new features were already available in Next.JS (which uses react canary). They include server components and actions, the new `use` hook, improvements to forms handling (`useFormStatus` and `useOptimistic`), and a small but long-awaited change: `forwardRef` is not necessary anymore!
segments.translated_content:
我们曾报道过React 19初始版本因Suspense机制变更而中止发布的情况——该变更会导致未在事件处理函数中发起请求的Suspense应用出现瀑布式加载问题。  
React团队一直致力于重新引入Suspense兄弟组件预渲染功能，同时避免对提前发起请求的应用造成性能倒退。他们的解决方案现已就绪，称为[预热机制](https://react.dev/blog/2024/04/25/react-19-upgrade-guide#improvements-to-suspense)。提出该问题的React Query维护者Dominik[已确认对该修复方案表示满意](https://bsky.app/profile/tkdodo.eu/post/3layw6wk5bs2b)。  
与往常一样，这些新特性已率先在Next.JS（使用React Canary版本）中实现，包括服务端组件与Actions、新引入的`use`钩子、表单处理改进（`useFormStatus`和`useOptimistic`），以及一个虽小但期待已久的变更：不再需要手动调用`forwardRef`！

segments.content:
* 💸 [Omlet – Scan your repo and measure how and where React components are used](https://omlet.dev/?utm_campaign=partner_this-week-in-react_newsletter-quick-link-nov-2024)
* 👀 [Next.js segment cache initial implementation](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/72875): A rewrite of App Router's client caching implementation, designed with PPR and "use cache" in mind. Not production-ready at all, but in the future Next will cache by route segment instead of by full URL.
* 👀 [React Query may soon have a unified staleTime per query](https://github.com/TanStack/query/pull/8313) instead of one per “observer” (e.g. each `useQuery`). This will be less flexible but certainly easier to reason about.
* 👀 [React IDE](https://youtu.be/C8Mg-NSyqWg?t=14452): Mofei (React Compiler team) unveils at React Summit the plan to work on a VSCode extension powered by the compiler. Don't get too excited, because we don't know much about it yet!
* 👀 [TanStack Start is officially in beta](https://bsky.app/profile/tannerlinsley.com/post/3lbdl4zp2ns2n)
* 📖 [The Road to Next](https://www.road-to-next.com/): Robin Wieruch launched his paid Next.js 15 course with early access discounts.
* 🗓️ [React Day Berlin](https://reactday.berlin/?utm_source=Newsletter\&utm_medium=thisweekinreact) - 🇩🇪 Berlin - 13 & 16 December - Hurry and grab your ticket to the conference as prices are about to go up! And don’t forget your discount with code “TWIR”.
* 📜 [Essential Typescript for React](https://www.jacobparis.com/content/react-ts): A concise article on the most valuable tips to be productive.
* 📜 [Be careful with useSyncExternalStore](https://www.nico.fyi/blog/be-careful-with-usesyncexternalstore): implementation of a `useLocalStorage` hook using `useSyncExternalStore` and `superjson`.
* 📜 [5 differences between React server components and server-side rendering](https://www.tymzap.com/blog/5-differences-between-react-server-components-and-server-side-rendering): At this point you already know that they are not at all the same. This recaps the concrete differences between the two.
* 📜 [Design System: from scratch or from the shelf?](https://www.voorhoede.nl/en/blog/design-system-from-scratch-from-the-shelf/)
* 📜 [What are React Portals?](https://techhub.iodigital.com/articles/what-are-react-portals)
* 📜 [Creating your own React design system analytics tool with react-scanner](https://alexocallaghan.com/creating-your-own-react-design-system-analytics-tool)
* 📜 [Quick Guide to Building a PWA with Next.js](https://playfulprogramming.com/posts/pwa-nextjs-guide)
* 📜 [Vercel - Skew Protection is now enabled by default for new projects](https://vercel.com/changelog/skew-protection-is-now-enabled-by-default-for-new-projects)
* 📜 [React Anti-Pattern: Stop Passing Setters Down the Components Tree](https://matanbobi.dev/posts/stop-passing-setter-functions-to-components)
* 📦 [react-scan](https://github.com/aidenybai/react-scan): The MillionJS team released a new tool to find performance issues (re-renders) in React apps.
* 📦 [PayloadCMS 3.0 - Seamless integration with Next.js app router](https://github.com/payloadcms/payload/releases/tag/v3.0.0): The CMS can now run seamlessly within your existing Next.js app, exposing a `withPayload()` plugin.
* 📦 [MistCSS 1.0](https://github.com/typicode/mistcss): Instead of generating full React components from CSS, the library now bets on generating types to enhance intrinsic React JSX elements. Interesting idea!
* 🎥 [Jack Herrington - “use cache” NextJS’s latest take on data caching](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZDRGEewXkrs)
* 🎥 [Theo - How To Avoid Big Serverless Bills](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jsuNjCAngnQ): Various tips for Vercel or Next.js users.
* 🎥 [React Summit US - Live Stream](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C8Mg-NSyqWg)

segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [Omlet – 扫描代码库并测量React组件的使用方式和位置](https://omlet.dev/?utm_campaign=partner_this-week-in-react_newsletter-quick-link-nov-2024)
- 👀 [Next.js分段缓存初始实现](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/72875)：针对App Router客户端缓存机制的重构，专为PPR和"use cache"设计。目前尚未达到生产就绪状态，但未来Next.js将按路由段而非完整URL进行缓存。
- 👀 [React Query可能即将实现每个查询的统一staleTime](https://github.com/TanStack/query/pull/8313)，而非每个"observer"（如每个`useQuery`）单独设置。这会降低灵活性但显著提升可理解性。
- 👀 [React IDE](https://youtu.be/C8Mg-NSyqWg?t=14452)：React编译器团队的Mofei在React Summit上公布了基于编译器开发的VSCode扩展计划。先别太激动，因为具体细节尚不明确！
- 👀 [TanStack Start正式进入beta阶段](https://bsky.app/profile/tannerlinsley.com/post/3lbdl4zp2ns2n)
- 📖 [Next.js进阶之路](https://www.road-to-next.com/)：Robin Wieruch推出了付费Next.js 15课程并提供早鸟优惠。
- 🗓️ [React Day Berlin](https://reactday.berlin/?utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=thisweekinreact) - 🇩🇪 柏林 - 12月13日&16日 - 票价即将上涨，速抢参会门票！使用优惠码"TWIR"可享折扣。
- 📜 [React TypeScript必备技巧](https://www.jacobparis.com/content/react-ts)：浓缩高效开发的核心要点。
- 📜 [谨慎使用useSyncExternalStore](https://www.nico.fyi/blog/be-careful-with-usesyncexternalstore)：结合`useSyncExternalStore`和`superjson`实现`useLocalStorage`钩子的案例。
- 📜 [React服务端组件与传统服务端渲染的5大区别](https://www.tymzap.com/blog/5-differences-between-react-server-components-and-server-side-rendering)：澄清两者本质差异的技术解析。
- 📜 [设计系统：自研还是采用现成方案？](https://www.voorhoede.nl/en/blog/design-system-from-scratch-from-the-shelf/)
- 📜 [React Portals详解](https://techhub.iodigital.com/articles/what-are-react-portals)
- 📜 [利用react-scanner构建设计系统分析工具](https://alexocallaghan.com/creating-your-own-react-design-system-analytics-tool)
- 📜 [Next.js构建PWA快速指南](https://playfulprogramming.com/posts/pwa-nextjs-guide)
- 📜 [Vercel默认启用新项目的Skew Protection功能](https://vercel.com/changelog/skew-protection-is-now-enabled-by-default-for-new-projects)
- 📜 [React反模式：停止向下传递setter函数](https://matanbobi.dev/posts/stop-passing-setter-functions-to-components)
- 📦 [react-scan](https://github.com/aidenybai/react-scan)：MillionJS团队发布的React应用性能问题（重复渲染）检测工具。
- 📦 [PayloadCMS 3.0 – 深度集成Next.js app router](https://github.com/payloadcms/payload/releases/tag/v3.0.0)：CMS现在可直接嵌入现有Next.js应用，通过`withPayload()`插件实现无缝集成。
- 📦 [MistCSS 1.0](https://github.com/typicode/mistcss)：不再从CSS生成完整React组件，转而通过类型增强原生React JSX元素的新思路。
- 🎥 [Jack Herrington解析NextJS最新数据缓存方案"use cache"](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZDRGEewXkrs)
- 🎥 [Theo教你避免Serverless巨额账单](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jsuNjCAngnQ)：针对Vercel/Next.js用户的实用建议。
- 🎥 [React Summit US直播回放](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C8Mg-NSyqWg)

segments.content: ## 💸 Sponsor
segments.sourceMdx: ## 💸 Sponsor {#sponsor2}

segments.content: [![Unleash Document Superpowers in Your React Apps!](/emails/issues/209/nutrient.jpg)](https://www.nutrient.io/sdk/web)
segments.sourceMdx: [![Unleash Document Superpowers in Your React Apps!](/emails/issues/209/nutrient.jpg)](https://www.nutrient.io/sdk/web)

segments.content: **[Unleash Document Superpowers in Your React Apps!](https://www.nutrient.io/sdk/web)**
segments.sourceMdx: **[Unleash Document Superpowers in Your React Apps!](https://www.nutrient.io/sdk/web)**

segments.content: Attention React enthusiasts: PSPDFKit is now **Nutrient**! 👋 We may have a new name, but our Web SDK is the same best in class choice you've come to rely on for viewing, annotating, and editing PDFs and other document types.
segments.sourceMdx: Attention React enthusiasts: PSPDFKit is now **Nutrient**! 👋 We may have a new name, but our Web SDK is the same best in class choice you've come to rely on for viewing, annotating, and editing PDFs and other document types.
segments.translated_content: React开发者请注意：PSPDFKit现已更名为**Nutrient**！👋 虽然我们有了新名字，但我们的Web SDK依然是您处理PDF及其他文档类型时值得信赖的顶级解决方案，支持查看、批注和编辑。

segments.content:
* 🏎️ Get started quickly with a free trial and extensive documentation
* ⏱️ Save time developing by leveraging the slick built-in UI and **Baseline-UI**, our new design system
* 🛠️ Leverage extensive APIs for processing and customization
* 🆘 Make use of our support and solution engineering team to get help from domain experts
segments.sourceMdx:
- 🏎️ Get started quickly with a free trial and extensive documentation
- ⏱️ Save time developing by leveraging the slick built-in UI and **Baseline-UI**, our new design system
- 🛠️ Leverage extensive APIs for processing and customization
- 🆘 Make use of our support and solution engineering team to get help from domain experts
segments.translated_content:
- 🏎️ 通过免费试用和详尽文档快速上手
- ⏱️ 利用内置的优雅UI和全新设计系统**Baseline-UI**节省开发时间
- 🛠️ 通过丰富的API实现文档处理和深度定制
- 🆘 专业支持团队为您提供领域专家级协助

segments.content: We've got you covered on **all platforms** from mobile to backend.
segments.sourceMdx: We've got you covered on **all platforms** from mobile to backend.
segments.translated_content: 我们覆盖**全平台**需求，从移动端到后端一应俱全。

segments.content: Want to work on challenging problems and have **impact on hundreds of applications**? Check out our open positions such as [Senior Frontend Developer](https://www.nutrient.io/company/careers/web-frontend).
segments.sourceMdx: Want to work on challenging problems and have **impact on hundreds of applications**? Check out our open positions such as [Senior Frontend Developer](https://www.nutrient.io/company/careers/web-frontend).
segments.translated_content: 想要挑战技术难题并**影响数百款应用**？查看我们的[高级前端开发工程师](https://www.nutrient.io/company/careers/web-frontend)等开放职位。

segments.content: ## 📱 React-Native
segments.sourceMdx: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}

segments.content: [![Expo Workflows](/emails/issues/210/workflows.jpg)](https://expo.dev/blog/expo-workflows-automate-your-release-process)
segments.sourceMdx: [![Expo Workflows](/emails/issues/210/workflows.jpg)](https://expo.dev/blog/expo-workflows-automate-your-release-process)

segments.content:
[**Expo Workflows**](https://expo.dev/blog/expo-workflows-automate-your-release-process)
Expo has announced "Workflows," a new CI/CD tool for React Native and Expo apps that simplifies and accelerates app releases with pre-packaged jobs (such as E2E tests using Maestro), automated workflows, and smart machine selection for optimal performance. While it’s not a direct replacement for more general CI/CD solutions like GitHub Actions, it promises exciting improvements worth exploring.
segments.sourceMdx:
[**Expo Workflows**](https://expo.dev/blog/expo-workflows-automate-your-release-process)
Expo has announced "Workflows," a new CI/CD tool for React Native and Expo apps that simplifies and accelerates app releases with pre-packaged jobs (such as E2E tests using Maestro), automated workflows, and smart machine selection for optimal performance. While it’s not a direct replacement for more general CI/CD solutions like GitHub Actions, it promises exciting improvements worth exploring.
segments.translated_content:
[**Expo工作流**](https://expo.dev/blog/expo-workflows-automate-your-release-process)
Expo宣布推出"工作流"——专为React Native和Expo应用打造的新型CI/CD工具，通过预置任务（如使用Maestro的端到端测试）、自动化流程和智能机器选择优化发布效率。虽不能完全替代GitHub Actions等通用方案，但其创新功能值得探索。

segments.content: 🎉 [Expo Launch Party](https://expo.dev/launch-party) is still running. Don’t miss their announcements!
segments.sourceMdx: 🎉 [Expo Launch Party](https://expo.dev/launch-party) is still running. Don’t miss their announcements\!
segments.translated_content: 🎉 [Expo发布派对](https://expo.dev/launch-party)仍在进行中，别错过最新动态！

segments.content:
* 📣 [Expo - Introducing Channel Pausing for EAS Update : Pause your channels either on the web page or via the eas cli](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/11-14-channel-pausing)
* 📜 [Universal React Server Components in Expo Router (in beta)](https://expo.dev/blog/universal-react-server-components-developer-preview): Expo Router introduces for the first time universal React Server Components, enabling server-side rendering in both native and web apps. Though not production-ready due to unavailable production exports and mainly aimed at library authors, it's an exciting development because it enables direct server-side access to resources like secrets, databases, and file systems, simplifying development and improving performance by eliminating client-server round trips.
* 📜 [The magic of Expo DOM Components](https://expo.dev/blog/the-magic-of-expo-dom-components): Expo DOM Components make it easier to integrate web features into React Native apps, combining the speed of WebViews with incremental native migration. While limited by WebView performance and compatibility with some Expo features, future updates aim to enhance native integration and optimize performance.
segments.sourceMdx:
- 📣 [Expo \- Introducing Channel Pausing for EAS Update : Pause your channels either on the web page or via the eas cli](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/11-14-channel-pausing)
- 📜 [Universal React Server Components in Expo Router (in beta)](https://expo.dev/blog/universal-react-server-components-developer-preview): Expo Router introduces for the first time universal React Server Components, enabling server-side rendering in both native and web apps. Though not production-ready due to unavailable production exports and mainly aimed at library authors, it's an exciting development because it enables direct server-side access to resources like secrets, databases, and file systems, simplifying development and improving performance by eliminating client-server round trips.
- 📜 [The magic of Expo DOM Components](https://expo.dev/blog/the-magic-of-expo-dom-components): Expo DOM Components make it easier to integrate web features into React Native apps, combining the speed of WebViews with incremental native migration. While limited by WebView performance and compatibility with some Expo features, future updates aim to enhance native integration and optimize performance.
segments.translated_content:
- 📣 [Expo - 推出EAS更新的频道暂停功能：可通过网页或eas cli暂停频道](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/11-14-channel-pausing)
- 📜 [Expo Router中的通用React服务端组件（测试版）](https://expo.dev/blog/universal-react-server-components-developer-preview)：首次实现原生与Web应用的服务器端渲染，允许直接访问数据库等资源。虽因缺少生产导出暂不推荐生产环境使用，但为库作者提供了简化开发的新可能。
- 📜 [Expo DOM组件的魔力](https://expo.dev/blog/the-magic-of-expo-dom-components)：以WebView速度实现Web功能集成，未来更新将增强原生兼容性与性能优化。

segments.content:
* 💸 [notJust Hack - the best online Hackathon for React Native developers. This December - build, launch, compete, and win prizes!](https://bit.ly/4fDgOXX)
* 📖 [Mastering the Big Screen: React Native for TV guidebook](https://www.callstack.com/ebook/mastering-the-big-screen-react-native-for-tv-guidebook)
* 🐦 [Oskar made a POC of Jetpack Compose adaptive navigation for react-native-bottom-tabs](https://x.com/o_kwasniewski/status/1858620684706214095)
* 🐦 [Mike demoed a 1.2GB file upload over the network with React Native FastIO](https://x.com/grabbou/status/1858920818744389947)
* 🐦 [Jay is cooking a new List component, codename Legend List, that may be even faster than FlashList](https://x.com/jmeistrich/status/1855663310386958840)
* 🐦 [SwiftUI MeshGradient component in React Native thanks to a new feature in Expo Modules not yet announced in Expo SDK 52](https://bsky.app/profile/tsapeta.dev/post/3lbf2kw75t22y)
* 📜 [How to Integrate React Native With an Existing App](https://www.callstack.com/blog/how-to-integrate-react-native-with-an-existing-app)
* 📦 [React Native 0.76.2](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.76.2)
* 📦 [React Native Executorch 0.1 - Run AI models on device, powered by ExecuTorch](https://blog.swmansion.com/introducing-react-native-executorch-2bdb87592884)
* 📦 [React Native SVG 15.9 - New filters FeDropShadow and FeComposite](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-svg/releases/tag/v15.9.0)
* 📦 [React Native Gesture Handler 2.21 - Two-finger Pan gesture on web, new `ReanimatedDrawerLayout` component](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-gesture-handler/releases/tag/2.21.0)
* 📦 [React Native Screens 4.1 & 4.2 - Fix iOS modal animation issues on old architecture, support for transparent large header on iOS](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-screens/releases/tag/4.2.0)
* 📦 [React Native Video 6.8 - Web Support and HLS video caching](https://github.com/TheWidlarzGroup/react-native-video/releases/tag/v6.8.0)
* 📦 [React Native Skia 1.5.4 - Experimental Graphite (Vulkan/Metal) backend via build flag](https://github.com/Shopify/react-native-skia/releases/tag/v1.5.4)
* 📦 [React Native Turbo Haptics - Fast, worklet-compatible haptic feedback](https://github.com/christianbaroni/react-native-turbo-haptics)
* 📦 [React Native Yoga JSI 0.1](https://github.com/Swami-Laxmikant/react-native-yoga-jsi): This experimental lib gives you access to Yoga APIs on the JS side. It can be used with libs like React Native Skia to layout elements on a canvas.
* 🎙️ [Rocket Ship 54 - React Native Music Game with Kim Chouard (Skia, NativeWind, Expo AV)](https://share.transistor.fm/s/34b8c9fc)
* 🎥 [Simon Grimm - Expo SDK 52: DOM, RSC, Router, New Architecture & Packages](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OROMGU3jq6E)
